appDesc.message: Melatonin for Chrome - your melatonin levels follow the sun, so should you browser!

automatic_options_description.message: Keyframes control how Melatonin changes throughout the day. Altitudes above/under 90/-90 are interpreted respectively as local solar noon/midnight.

automatic_opacity_warning.message: If you manually change opacity, this will be unchecked automatically.

options_notification.message: Enabling experimental web features improves the contrast of Melatonin, making it better for reading text and viewing images. See this blogpost for further information.

experimental_notification.message: Hey! If you activate Chrome's experimental web features you'll get better contrast for reading or viewing images with Melatonin!
